name: SnowReportforBlandfordSkiArea
0:
”Alexa, open Blandford Ski Area”
”Alexa, ask Blandford Ski Area for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Blandford Ski Area for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blandford ski area
des: The Blandford Ski Area Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
